title: FS: Baseball Stadium Postcard Lot SOLD

posts.post_title: FS: Baseball Stadium Postcard Lot SOLD
posts.post_content:
All forms of payment accepted. PM over post.

Here is a lot of 5 baseball postcards for sale today.
1939 Doubleday Field, Cooperstown, NY. 1st Hall of Fame Game (2 of these)
Ball Park, Kansas City, MO Postmarked 1940
Polo Grounds, NY Postmarked 1954
Forbes Field, Pittsburgh, PA

SOLD

Thanks for looking,
Tony
